title: Is it permissible to Buy or Sell Gold in installments? - Sheikh Assim Al Hakeem
transcript: nor ally says can somebody buy a bulk of gold and sell it in installments the answer is no gold and silver and currency must be sold and bought simultaneously give and take I cannot sell you a gram or a kilogram of gold in installments I cannot give it to you okay sold for 20,000 euros you can bring them after half an hour no after war no it has to be simultaneous give-and-take so this is not permissible
